Dear Harry:
Thanks for your note. I know you are very busy if
Madame Paz has been visiting you. I thought she was
quite a delightful lady.
KATHLEEN MOON

So far, the following programs are the only ones that
have been released to us by producers of the group in
which we were interested:
Roots of Jazz
Know Your Neighbors
"What's The Big Idea
World of Wonders
Ways of Mankind
The Jeffersonian Heritage
A Survey of the Madrigal
Man's Right to Knowledge and the Free Use Thereof
If you question our use of any of these, please let
me know at once as we are now in the process of pre¬
paring the Catalog for printing.
Sincerely,
Anna L. Hyer
Associate Executive Secretary
